references.reason: This paper establishes the connection between conditional expectation operators and deep canonical correlation analysis (deepCCA), which is a foundational element of the proposed Neural Conditional Probability (NCP) method.

references.paper_title: Lincde: conditional density estimation via lindsey's method
references.reason: This work provides a comprehensive overview of existing methods for learning conditional distributions and categorizes four main approaches, which is the basis for comparison of the NCP method.

references.paper_title: Learning invariant representations of time-homogeneous stochastic dynamical systems
references.reason: This paper establishes a theoretical foundation for the NCP method, providing guarantees on optimization consistency and statistical accuracy.

references.paper_title: Distribution-free prediction bands for non-parametric regression
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of conformal prediction, which is a key element for uncertainty quantification, a core aspect of the NCP methodology.

references.paper_title: Conditional density estimation with neural networks: Best practices and benchmarks
references.reason: This work provides a benchmark for conditional density estimation methods and datasets, which is used for evaluating and comparing the performance of NCP.
